text: I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have a favorite pizza place you can go to?
That's good to hear.  What do you like to do in your free time?
Reading is a great way to pass the time. What kind of books do you like to read?
i like to read fiction books
That's cool. What kind of fiction do you like? I like science fiction.
i like to read romantic fiction books
(I like to read romantic fiction books)
That's cool. I like romantic novels as well. What's your favorite one?
What kind of pizza do you like? I like pepperoni and sausage.
I love cheese pizza! It's one of my favorite foods. What's your favorite toppings?
